languages.text: {n}Круглые сутки логистикары и писцы корпели над списком задокументированных чудес, связанных с Горнилом. Увы, опираться им приходилось на хроники столь древние и фрагментарные, что не всех техножрецов удовлетворил предоставленный ими многотомный конспект. Когда их работа была окончена и представлена на суд, засвидетельствованная святость древнего механизма была официально признана. Горнилу было суждено остаться в ведении Ордена Молота.{/n}

{n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. Alas, they had to refer to chronicles so ancient and fragmentary that not all of the Tech-Priests were satisfied with the multiple tomes of research presented to them. When their work was complete and presented during the arbitration, the evident sanctity of the ancient mechanism was officially acknowledged. The Crucible was destined to remain in the purview of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Круглые сутки логистикары и писцы корпели над списком задокументированных чудес, связанных с Горнилом. Увы, опираться им приходилось на хроники столь древние и фрагментарные, что не всех техножрецов удовлетворил предоставленный ими многотомный конспект. Когда их работа была окончена и представлена на суд, засвидетельствованная святость древнего механизма была официально признана. Горнилу было суждено остаться в ведении Ордена Молота.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Day and night, the Logisticarii and the scribes had pored over a list of documented miracles related to the Crucible. When their work was completed and presented during the debate, the proven sanctity of the ancient mechanism could no longer raise any questions. The Crucible was destined to remain in the Order of the Hammer's care.{/n}

languages.text: {n}逻辑士和书记员夜以继日地仔细研究档案，寻找与熔炉有关的奇迹事件。遗憾的是，他们不得不参考某些过于古老、过于琐碎的编年史。尽管摆出了长达数卷的研究总结，但仍有部分技术神甫感到不满。不过，修士们在仲裁期间成功提交了工作成果，而这台古代装置的神圣性也得到了正式承认。命运已经注定，熔炉将会留在重锤修会的管辖范围内。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. Alas, they had to refer to chronicles so ancient and fragmentary that not all of the Tech-Priests were satisfied with the multiple tomes of research presented to them. When their work was complete and presented during the arbitration, the evident sanctity of the ancient mechanism was officially acknowledged. The Crucible was destined to remain in the purview of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}逻辑士和书记员夜以继日地仔细研究档案，寻找与熔炉有关的奇迹事件。遗憾的是，他们不得不参考某些过于古老、过于琐碎的编年史。尽管摆出了长达数卷的研究总结，但仍有部分技术神甫感到不满。不过，修士们在仲裁期间成功提交了工作成果，而这台古代装置的神圣性也得到了正式承认。命运已经注定，熔炉将会留在重锤修会的管辖范围内。{/n}
{n}逻辑士和书记员夜以继日地仔细研究档案，寻找与熔炉有关的奇迹。遗憾的是，他们不得不参考某些过于古老、过于琐碎的编年史。尽管摆出了长达数卷的研究总结，但仍有部分技术神甫感到不满。不过，修士们在仲裁期间成功提交了工作成果，而这台古代装置的神圣性也得到了正式承认。命运已经注定，熔炉将会留在重锤修会的管辖范围内。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Día y noche, Logisticares y escribas estudiaron la lista de eventos milagrosos registrados del Crisol, pero debían recurrir a crónicas tan antiguas y fragmentadas que no todos los tecnosacerdotes se mostraron satisfechos con los gruesos volúmenes de investigación. Cuando completaron su trabajo y lo presentaron ante el tribunal de arbitraje, se reconoció oficialmente la santidad indudable del antiguo mecanismo. El Crisol se mantendría bajo la jurisdicción de la Orden del Martillo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. Alas, they had to refer to chronicles so ancient and fragmentary that not all of the Tech-Priests were satisfied with the multiple tomes of research presented to them. When their work was complete and presented during the arbitration, the evident sanctity of the ancient mechanism was officially acknowledged. The Crucible was destined to remain in the purview of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Día y noche, Logisticares y escribas estudiaron la lista de eventos milagrosos registrados del Crisol, pero debían recurrir a crónicas tan antiguas y fragmentadas que no todos los tecnosacerdotes se mostraron satisfechos con los gruesos volúmenes de investigación. Cuando completaron su trabajo y lo presentaron ante el tribunal de arbitraje, se reconoció oficialmente la santidad indudable del antiguo mecanismo. El Crisol se mantendría bajo la jurisdicción de la Orden del Martillo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}昼夜を問わず、論理学者と書記は坩堝に関連する奇跡の記録書に目を通した。あいにく、彼らは非常に古く、断片的な年代記を参照しなければならならず、技術司祭の全員が、提示された複数の学術書に満足したわけではない。彼らの作業が完成し、仲裁の場で披露されたとき、古代のメカニズムの神聖さが公式に認められた。かようにして坩堝は鉄槌の修道会の管轄下に置かれることになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. Alas, they had to refer to chronicles so ancient and fragmentary that not all of the Tech-Priests were satisfied with the multiple tomes of research presented to them. When their work was complete and presented during the arbitration, the evident sanctity of the ancient mechanism was officially acknowledged. The Crucible was destined to remain in the purview of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}昼夜を問わず、論理学者と書記は坩堝に関連する奇跡の記録書に目を通した。あいにく、彼らは非常に古く、断片的な年代記を参照しなければならならず、技術司祭の全員が、提示された複数の学術書に満足したわけではない。彼らの作業が完成し、仲裁の場で披露されたとき、古代のメカニズムの神聖さが公式に認められた。かようにして坩堝は鉄槌の修道会の管轄下に置かれることになった。{/n}
{n}昼夜を問わず、論理学者と書記は坩堝に関連する奇跡の記録書に目を通した。あいにく、彼らは非常に古く、断片的な年代記を参照しなければならならず、技術司祭の全員が、提示された複数の学術書に満足したわけではない。彼らの作業が完成し、仲裁の場で披露されたとき、古代のメカニズムの神聖さが公式に認められた。かようにして坩堝は鉄槌の修道会の管轄下に置かれることになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pendant plusieurs jours et plusieurs nuits, logisticars et scribes s'emploient à parcourir la liste d'événements miraculeux documentés et liés au Creuset. Hélas, ils doivent se référer à des annales si anciennes et si parcellaires que les nombreux volumes de recherches amassés ne suffisent pas à convaincre tous les technoprêtres. Quand le fruit de leurs travaux est présenté à la table des négociations, le caractère éminemment sacré du mécanisme antique est reconnu officiellement. Le Creuset restera donc sous la garde de l'Ordre du Marteau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. Alas, they had to refer to chronicles so ancient and fragmentary that not all of the Tech-Priests were satisfied with the multiple tomes of research presented to them. When their work was complete and presented during the arbitration, the evident sanctity of the ancient mechanism was officially acknowledged. The Crucible was destined to remain in the purview of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tag und Nacht brüteten Logistikare und Schreiber über der Liste der wundersamen Ereignisse in Verbindung mit dem Tiegel. Leider mussten sie jedoch mit derart alten und fragmentierten Chroniken arbeiten, wodurch nicht alle Techpriester mit den dicken Büchern zufrieden waren, die ihnen vorgelegt wurden. Als ihre Arbeit abgeschlossen war und während der Schiedsverhandlung präsentiert wurde, erkannten alle die offenkundige Heiligkeit des uralten Mechanismus an. Der Tiegel war dazu bestimmt, in der Obhut des Ordens des Hammers zu verbleiben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. {n}Tag und Nacht brüteten Logistikare und Schreiber über der Liste der dokumentierten Wunder des Tiegels. Leider mussten sie jedoch mit derart alten und fragmentierten Chroniken arbeiten, dass nicht alle Techpriester mit den dicken Büchern zufrieden waren, die ihnen vorgelegt wurden. Als ihre Arbeit abgeschlossen war und während der Schiedsverhandlung präsentiert wurde, erkannten alle die offenkundige Heiligkeit des uralten Mechanismus an. Der Tiegel war dazu bestimmt, in der Obhut des Ordens des Hammers zu verbleiben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lojistikarlar ve kâtipler, gece gündüz demeden Pota ile alakalı belgelenmiş mucizevi hadiselerin listesini inceledi. Ne yazık ki öylesine antik ve bölük pörçük vakayinamelere başvurmaları gerekti ki Tekno Rahiplerin tamamı, kendilerine sunulan birçok araştırma kitap cildinden memnun kalmadı. İşlerini tamamlayıp tahkim kuruluna sunmalarının ardından kadim mekanizmanın aşikâr olan mukaddesliği resmî olarak tanındı. Pota'nın Çekiç Tarikatı'nın hükmünde kalmasına karar verildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Day and night, logisticars and scribes pored over the list of recorded miraculous events related to the Crucible. Alas, they had to refer to chronicles so ancient and fragmentary that not all of the Tech-Priests were satisfied with the multiple tomes of research presented to them. When their work was complete and presented during the arbitration, the evident sanctity of the ancient mechanism was officially acknowledged. The Crucible was destined to remain in the purview of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}
